name: Tanium
description:
This plugin is used to fetch devices from **Home > Total Endpoints** and their respective risk scores from **Modules > Benchmark > Tanium Risk Score 2.0 > Endpoints by Risk Score** page of the Tanium platform. This plugin does not support performing any actions on devices.

Netskope normalization score calculation => (1000 - (Tanium Risk Score)).

configuration.label: API Base URL
configuration.description: API Base URL of Tanium instance. e.g. https://<domain>-api.titankube.com

configuration.label: API Token
configuration.description: API Key generated from the Tanium instance. API Key can be generated from 'Administration > API Tokens > New API Token' page.
